thread.title: Farhan Akhtar attends NH 7 with his Rock On 2 boys!
thread.title_full: Farhan Akhtar attends NH 7 with his Rock On 2 boys!

author: Prathamesh Jadhav | India.com Entertainment Desk
title: Farhan Akhtar attends NH 7 with his Rock On 2 boys!
text:
Farhan Akhtar attends NH 7 with his Rock On 2 boys! By India.com Entertainment Desk on October 25, 2015 at 1:40 AM Comments 
Farhan Akhtar who is currently shooting for ‘Rock On 2′ in Shillong, took time and out and attended the NH 7 weekender in the city along with Arjun Rampal and Purab Kohli. The 38-year-old actor who is an avid music lover and plays a Rockstar in Rock On 2 which was in line with his interests. Farhan enjoys attending musical events and concerts as it helps him observe and learn. ALSO READ: Rock On 2: Farhan Akhtar’s rockstar look revealed? 
Farhan is currently in a musical phase with his upcoming film Rock On 2 and the various music concerts conducted by him across the country via Farhan Akhtar LIVE (his rock band) in support of his MARD initiative.Directed by Shujaat Saudagar and produced by Ritesh Sidhwani and Farhan Akhtar’s Excel Entertainment, ‘Rock on 2′ releases next year. Check this out! Will Farhan Akhtar showcase his music diaries in Rock On 2? 
Farhan’s onscreen musical venture, ‘Rock On 2′, a sequel to the 2008 hit ‘Rock On’, also stars Shraddha Kapoor in the lead apart from the primary cast from the prequel. While all the actors including Prachi Desai are reprising their roles, Shraddha is an addition to the film’s crew. 
  25, 2015 2:10 AM Topics:
